result.execSummary:
The defendant Javier Alfonso GONZALEZ was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery (DVO) [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Incident], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: under the Huber Law.   Transfer to Sheboygan County Jail is authorized.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Javier Alfonso GONZALEZ

records.addlTxt: Request and Response Regarding Open Records Request

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: All records scanned and verified.

State files an Amended Information charging the defendant 1 ct. battery (DVO), contrary to Section 940.19(1) of the Wisconsin Statutes; 1 ct. Disorderly conduct (DVO), contrary to Section 947.01(1) of the Wisconsin Statutes; and 1 ct. Possess drug paraphernalia, contrary to Section 961.573(1) of the Wisconsin Statutes.   
Count 1 - Battery (DVO) - No contest plea.  Convicted.   State moves to dismiss and read in counts 2 and 3.   Motion granted.   Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for fifty (50) days, under the Huber Law, to commence on 09-03-15 by 6:00 p.m.   Transfer to Sheboygan County Jail is authorized.  $543.00 court costs imposed, to be paid by 10-03-15 or 1 day jail.  $500.00 cash bail to be applied.  Defendant is given credit for 19 days time already served.

RE:  Alexa Vlachos, on 01-26-15.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of disorderly conduct, false imprisonment, possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 02-02-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and that he have no contact with Alexa Vlachos.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
